name: ORG_SURG_DNR_FLUID
description: Contains information on fluid administration during surgery for the organ donor.

columns.name: ORG_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the organ record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FLUID_ADMIN_DNR_C_NAME
columns.description: The types of fluids administered to the donor.

columns.name: FLUID_ADMIN_NUM_DNR
columns.description: The amount of the corresponding type of fluid administered.
